title: Help me decide what champion i should get next pls
body:
{{champion:115}} my first main, im still a god with him when hes free
{{champion:245}} because hes ekko, hes cool..i was a beast with him on first release but now days im trash with him
{{champion:74}} to annoy people for funnzies
{{champion:163}} never played her before and i want to try her out
{{champion:427}} to troll the enemies with
{{champion:432}} my old support main, was a god bard
{{champion:412}} my second support main, i dont miss
{{champion:203}} one of my favorite champions mained her back when i jungled
{{champion:223}} another one of my favorites, played him jg and top full tank, still did a shitt ton fo damage


as you can see this is a very hard decision for me so pls halp
also if ur wondering, my old account got perma banned so thats how i mained a lot of champions i dont even own yet.

replies.body: Trundle for when you want to troll
